0100111010101011 0101011011111010 0 -> sum: 1010010110100101, cout: 0

1010111000100111 1110100111110000 1 -> sum: 1001100000011000, cout: 1

0000000111100101 1110000100001001 1 -> sum: 1110001011101111, cout: 0
